tool_description: Jikan is an Unofficial MyAnimeList API. It scrapes the website to satisfy the need for a complete API which MyAnimeList lacks.
title: Jikan API

api_list.name: Get Anime By ID
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific anime by its MyAnimeList ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The MyAnimeList ID of the anime.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api.jikan.moe/v4/anime/{id}"

response = requests.get(url)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Anime Characters
api_list.description: Retrieve the characters of a specific anime by its MyAnimeList ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The MyAnimeList ID of the anime.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api.jikan.moe/v4/anime/{id}/characters"

response = requests.get(url)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Anime Staff
api_list.description: Retrieve the staff of a specific anime by its MyAnimeList ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The MyAnimeList ID of the anime.

api_list.code:

url = "https://api.jikan.moe/v4/anime/{id}/staff"
